Test Name: Marfan, Loeys-Dietz, and Aortopathy Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, saliva, or buccal swab
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants associated with Marfan syndrome, Loeys-Dietz syndrome, and related aortopathies for diagnostic and clinical management purposes.
Container: EDTA blood tube or approved saliva/buccal swab collection kit
Equipment: Thermal cycler, next-generation sequencing (NGS) machine, centrifuge, micro-pipettes, vortex mixer
